Server.Name: War of the Walkers v8 Stable
Server.Description: The War of the Walkers 19.8.x - Stable Branch Latest Stable Version of the War of the Walkers Mod. Release Notes Link will take you to the official discord for the mod. For those who would like to donate here is the link: https://www.paypal.me/dwallorde Contains the following modlets: -0-CreaturePackAnimals -Author: Xyth Community Project -0-CreaturePackFantasy -Author: Xyth Community Project -0-CreaturePackHumans -Author: Xyth Community Project -0-CreaturePackZombies -Author: Xyth Community Project -CCTV -Author: Xyth -NerdScurvy_Toybox -Author: NerdScurvy -SMXhud -Author: Sirillion -SMXlib -Author: Sirillion -SMXmenu -Author: Sirillion -SMXui -Author: Sirillion -ZMXhudCP -Author: Sirillion -ZMXhudCPTHB -Author: Sirillion -ZMXuiCP -Author: Sirillion -ZMXuiCPBBMxl -Author: Sirillion 7DTD Version Required: 19.4 Stable.
